## tidyverse!
```{r tidyverse}
library(tidyverse)
```

## load in a dataset
```{r}
###reads in a dataset
litters_data <- read_csv(file = 'FAS_litters.csv')
litters_data <-  janitor:: clean_names(litters_data)

pups_data <- read_csv("FAS_pups.csv")
pups_data <- janitor::clean_names(pups_data)
?janitor::clean_names(pups_dat)



head(pups_data)
tail(pups_data)
skimr::skim(pups_data)

```

## specify the col_class
```{r specify the col_class}
pups_data = read_csv("FAS_pups.csv", col_types = "ciiiii")
skimr::skim(pups_data)
```

## readxl and haven

```{r}
library(readxl)
mlb11_data <- read_excel('mlb11.xlsx',range = "A1:D7")
mlb11_data
```

```{r read in sas}
library(haven)
pulse_data <- read_sas("public_pulse_data.sas7bdat")
pulse_data
```
